archimate:DataObject.name: Rule specific configuration
archimate:DataObject.documentation:
Rules are used to transform information from email subject or other pre-defined information towards the ticket.
Rules samples: Rule1: Find this string in subject/body: "server_name:". If found, use the value after this located string (e.g. "email.server") to build the ticket-field (e.g., for CMDB_CI). Rule2: if sender is whatever@domain.com, set impact/urgency of the ticket to Medium. Sure rules and their data-sets can be more complex.
